a3ComDot1dGmrpAdminStatus.name: a3ComDot1dGmrpAdminStatus
a3ComDot1dGmrpAdminStatus.description: The value enabled(1) indicates that GMRP is enabled on this device, for all ports, in all VLANs, for which it has not been specifically disabled, if GARP is also enabled for this device. When disabled(2), GMRP is disabled for all ports, in all VLANs. The default value is disabled(2).

a3ComDot1dGvrpAdminStatus.name: a3ComDot1dGvrpAdminStatus
a3ComDot1dGvrpAdminStatus.description: The value enabled(1) indicates that GVRP is enabled on this device, for all ports for which it has not been specifically disabled, if GARP is also enabled for this device. When disabled(2), GVRP is disabled for all ports on this device. The default value is disabled(2).

a3ComGarpJoinTime.name: a3ComGarpJoinTime
a3ComGarpJoinTime.description: The GARP Join Timer interval, in units of 1/100th of a second, for all ports on this device. The default value is 20 centiseconds.

a3ComGarpLeaveTime.name: a3ComGarpLeaveTime
a3ComGarpLeaveTime.description: The GARP Leave Timer interval, in units of 1/100th of a second, for all ports on this device. The default value is 60 centiseconds.

a3ComGarpLeaveAllTime.name: a3ComGarpLeaveAllTime
a3ComGarpLeaveAllTime.description: The GARP LeaveAll Timer interval, in units of 1/100th of a second, for all ports on this device. The default value is 1000 centiseconds.

a3ComSingleFdbStatus.name: a3ComSingleFdbStatus
a3ComSingleFdbStatus.description: The value enabled(1) indicates that the bridge is operating with a single Filtering Database. When disabled(2), the bridge is operating with independent Filtering Databases for each VLAN. This value must be enabled(1) and GVRP must be enabled, to support 3Com FastIP. The default value is disabled(2).

a3ComPortGarpTable.name: a3ComPortGarpTable
a3ComPortGarpTable.description: A table of GARP, GMRP and GVRP control information about every bridge port on this device.

a3ComPortGarpEntry.name: a3ComPortGarpEntry
a3ComPortGarpEntry.description: GARP control information for a bridge port.

a3ComPortGmrpAdminStatus.name: a3ComPortGmrpAdminStatus
a3ComPortGmrpAdminStatus.description: The administration state requested for GMRP on this port. The value enabled(1) indicates that GMRP should be enabled on this port, in all VLANs, if GARP is also enabled for this port. The value disabled(2), indicates that GMRP should be disabled on this port, in all VLANs. The value useDefault(3) indicates that GMRP should be enabled on this port, in all VLANs, if GARP is enabled for this port, and GMRP is also enabled for this device, defined by a3ComGmrpOperStatus. The default value is disabled(2).

a3ComPortGmrpOperStatus.name: a3ComPortGmrpOperStatus
a3ComPortGmrpOperStatus.description: The current operational status of GMRP on this port.

a3ComPortGvrpAdminStatus.name: a3ComPortGvrpAdminStatus
a3ComPortGvrpAdminStatus.description: The administration state requested for GVRP on this port. The value enabled(1) indicates that GVRP should be enabled on this port, if GARP is also enabled for this port. The value disabled(2), indicates that GVRP should be disabled on this port. The value useDefault(3) indicates that GVRP should be enabled on this port, if GARP is enabled for this port, and GVRP is also enabled for this device, defined by a3ComGvrpOperStatus. The default value is disabled(2).

a3ComPortGvrpOperStatus.name: a3ComPortGvrpOperStatus
a3ComPortGvrpOperStatus.description: The current operational status of GVRP on this port.

a3ComBridgePriorityTable.name: a3ComBridgePriorityTable
a3ComBridgePriorityTable.description: A table mapping Incoming User Priority to Outbound Access Priority.

a3ComBridgePriorityEntry.name: a3ComBridgePriorityEntry
a3ComBridgePriorityEntry.description: User Priority to Traffic Class mapping.

a3ComUserPriority.name: a3ComUserPriority
a3ComUserPriority.description: The user priority from incoming 802.1Q frames.

a3ComBridgePriority.name: a3ComBridgePriority
a3ComBridgePriority.description: The transmit priority for outgoing frames.

a3ComPortNeighbourTable.name: a3ComPortNeighbourTable
a3ComPortNeighbourTable.description: A table of Neighbour information for each port on this device.

a3ComPortNeighbourEntry.name: a3ComPortNeighbourEntry
a3ComPortNeighbourEntry.description: Neighbour information for a port on this device.

a3ComPortForwardUnknownVlans.name: a3ComPortForwardUnknownVlans
a3ComPortForwardUnknownVlans.description: This is configured statically, by management. The value true(1) indicates that traffic for unknown VLANs should be forwarded to this port: e.g. the neighbour is a switch or a router, that can process traffic for VLANs not configured locally by this device. The default value is false(2).

a3ComDot1qVlanStaticTable.name: a3ComDot1qVlanStaticTable
a3ComDot1qVlanStaticTable.description: A table containing static configuration information for each VLAN configured into the bridge by (local or network) management.

a3ComDot1qVlanStaticEntry.name: a3ComDot1qVlanStaticEntry
a3ComDot1qVlanStaticEntry.description: Static information for a VLAN configured into the bridge by (local or network) management.

a3ComDot1qVlanId.name: a3ComDot1qVlanId
a3ComDot1qVlanId.description: The VLAN identity for which this entry's static information applies.

a3ComDot1qVlanForbiddenPorts.name: a3ComDot1qVlanForbiddenPorts
a3ComDot1qVlanForbiddenPorts.description: The set of ports which are prohibited from joining this VLAN by management.

a3ComDot1qTpGroupTable.name: a3ComDot1qTpGroupTable
a3ComDot1qTpGroupTable.description: A table containing filtering information for each VLAN, configured into the bridge by (local or network) management, or learnt by GMRP, specifying the set of ports to which frames received on a specific VLAN and containing a specific Group destination address are allowed to be forwarded.

a3ComDot1qTpGroupEntry.name: a3ComDot1qTpGroupEntry
a3ComDot1qTpGroupEntry.description: Filtering information configured into the bridge by management, or learnt dynamically, specifying the set of ports to which frames received on a specific VLAN and containing a specific Group destination address are allowed to be forwarded.

a3ComDot1qTpGroupAddress.name: a3ComDot1qTpGroupAddress
a3ComDot1qTpGroupAddress.description: The destination Group MAC address in a frame to which this entry's filtering information applies.

a3ComDot1qTpGroupAllowedToGoTo.name: a3ComDot1qTpGroupAllowedToGoTo
a3ComDot1qTpGroupAllowedToGoTo.description: The complete set of ports in this VLAN, to which frames destined for a specific Group MAC address, are allowed to be forwarded.

a3ComDot1qTpGroupGmrp.name: a3ComDot1qTpGroupGmrp
a3ComDot1qTpGroupGmrp.description: The set of ports learnt by the stated method, in this VLAN, to which frames destined for a specific Group MAC address, are allowed to be forwarded.

a3ComDot1qTpGroupIgmp.name: a3ComDot1qTpGroupIgmp
a3ComDot1qTpGroupIgmp.description: The set of ports learnt by the stated method, in this VLAN, to which frames destined for a specific Group MAC address, are allowed to be forwarded.
